name: Buffer
description: Buffer is a smarter way to share pictures, links or videos on Facebook, Twitter and LinkedIn. Just drop everything worth sharing in your Buffer and it will be posted for you well spaced out over the day, at a better time.  It works from anywhere, with lots of app integrations, browser extensions and shortcuts!
